subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=|rs=艸17}}

# [[myoga]] or [[Japanese ginger]] (''[[Zingiber mioga]]''), of which only the shoots and flower buds are used in cooking

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: Not used in modern Japanese. Rare even in older texts. Generally only appears in the term {{m|ja|蘘荷|tr=myōga}}, which is now spelled {{m|ja|茗荷}} in modern Japanese.

subSections.title: Compounds
